Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: lights. brighter. appearing. disappearing. moving. triangular patterns.
divs: sighting detailsthe month of may\june. every night there is clear skys myself and my partner have seen the same lights appear in the sky out of nowhere. first one appears and then more appear and form a triangular shape of three lights. more appear out of this triangle and start to move, disappear and reappear in different parts of the sky. they also seem to take turns being in the triangle. one seems to dominate and doesnt move but gets different levels of brightness. at one point it gets so bright its like it is a huge fireball with flares. from looking like a star to a ball of fire? 100% it is in the sky and not outside our athmosphere. they must be miles away from where we were viewing them because i zoomed in on my camera. everything looked closer apart from the lights. i also noticed that when i photographed it, it reflected a light on the lense of my camera. and when i used the flash it got brighter\bigger. the same events happened almost every night and had very simular patterns. 100% not lights from plane or any human craft 100% not chinese lanterns. i know what i saw and i have pictures to prove it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mullingar
This sighting has never been favorited.
